name: Crash'N'Crack
description:
DOWNLOAD IT NOW, FOR SCRATCH!

BEFORE YOU PLAY, YOU MUST HAVE SCRATCH INSTALLED FIRST!

TO DOWNLOAD SCRATCH: https://scratch.mit.edu/download

AND DOWNLOAD THE ADOBE AIR(For Scratch 2): https://get.adobe.com/air/

2 SIMPLE CONTROLS:

Car Movement: Arrow Keys - Left and Right

Burn: Spacebar

To play it, click the green flag button. Do not bind the scripts unless you know what you doing.

THIS PROJECT IS MADE BY Tk Driver GAMES. Copyrighting is prohibited.

GAME MUST BE LAUNCHED ON SCRATCH 2 OR BETTER. SCRATCH 1.4 IS NOT SUITABLE BECAUSE THIS GAME IS .sb2 FORMAT FILE.
